articles.title: `Sri Lanka And Bangladesh Join Forces With BCCI To Sideline Pakistan In Asia Cup 2023`, Says Report - Zee News
articles.description: IPL 2023: From MS Dhoni To Abdul Samad, 7 Indian Batters Who Smashed Last Ball Six To Win IPL Game - In Pics “In case of India’s refusal to travel to Pakistan to compete in the Asia Cup, chances are there that the Pakistan government would not allow the Men i…
articles.content: The cricket boards of Sri Lanka and Bangladesh have expressed their support to the Board of Control for Cricket in India (BCCI) in moving the Asia Cup 2023 tournament out of Pakistan after India decl… [+2422 chars]
